sentences.sContent: His life is chronicled in a new biography published last week.
sentences.sCn: 他的生平被写成一本新传记，于上周出版。

sentences.sContent: The book chronicles the events leading up to the war.
sentences.sCn: 该书记述了导致战争爆发的一系列事件。

sentences.sContent: ...a new Newsweek blog that seeks to chronicle the lives of a group of young Obama supporters...

words.tran: 按年代顺序排列的；依时间前后排列而记载的
[统计] 按年代排列；作年表

trans.tranOther: to describe events in the order in which they happened
